name: JumpScan
tag_list: qr, qr-code, mobile, social-media, iphone, qr-codes, smart-phones, mobile-marketing, contact-card, digital-profile
overview:
JumpScan utilizes QR codes to create a “hardlink” from the physical world to the virtual world – displaying a user’s social media feeds and contact information. All that is required is a smart phone, and readily available QR code reader software.

Once a user signs up, and obtains his or her JumpScan QR code, they simply display it, and anyone with a smart phone can snap a photo of the image. The image links directly to a customized page on JumpScan.com, which displays the user’s most recent feeds from Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, etc.

Think of JumpScan.com as a bar code to your personal or business life.

Instead of obtaining a business card, or typing a phone number into a cell phone, a user can just take a snapshot of a JumpScan QR code and get the desired contact information with the click of a button.

Businesses can also use JumpScan by signing up and using their JumpScan QR code as the one image for all their consolidated social media feeds (Twitter, Facebook, etc.) If a business is closed, a potential customer can just click the JumpScan image on the door and have access to the latest information, phone number, store hours, etc.

milestones.description: Winning entry in Best Business Plan competition sponsored by Transylvania Partnership and the Economic Development Advisory Board. Prize of $5,000 awarded.
Launched improved user interface with easier navigation. Also added the ability to invite friends from Gmail and Facebook, as well as the ability to view and print your personal Jumpscan QR code.
Featured in Mashable/Statups, sponsored by Microsoft BizSpark
milestones.source_description: "How To: Create Custom QR Codes for Your Digital Life"
Jumpscan is a QR Code Portal to Your Virtual Life

milestones.description: Named in Gigaom article on QR Codes
milestones.source_description: QR Codes 101: Make Links to Your Website from Anywhere

milestones.description: JumpScan issues findings on iPhone vs. Android utilization for QR scanning
milestones.source_description: iPhone Trumps Android in QR Scanning Battle

milestones.description: JumpScan named official QR code service provider for mRecuritingCamp conference in San Francisco
milestones.source_description: mRecruitingcamp Announces Major Speakers from the Recruitment Industry Tabbed To Speak On The Future Of Mobile Recruiting

milestones.description: JumpScan Launches ScanTag.com -- A QR Code Management Console for Business
milestones.source_description: Introducing ScanTag.com, the QR Code Management Dashboard from the Creators of JumpScan.com

milestones.description: Inc.com names JumpScan as one of "10 Apps to Up Your Networking Game."
milestones.source_description: "10 Apps to Up Your Networking Game"

milestones.description: JumpScan listed as personal QR code generator in The New York Times
milestones.source_description: Want more information? Just scan me!
